results.adx_keywords: Football;Sports Injuries;Hamlin, Damar (1998- );Buffalo Bills;Cincinnati Bengals;National Football League
results.byline: By Emmanuel Morgan and Ken Belson
results.title: Damar Hamlin of Buffalo Bills in Critical Condition After Collapsing During N.F.L. Game
results.abstract: Hamlin, a 24-year-old safety, went into cardiac arrest after being hit, but his heartbeat was restored by medical personnel, the Bills said. The game against the Cincinnati Bengals was postponed.

media.caption: An ambulance carrying Damar Hamlin left the field at Paycor Stadium during the game between the Bills and Bengals on Monday night.

results.adx_keywords: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Attacks on Police;Police;Carjacking;Pennsylvania;Pittsburgh (Pa)
results.title: Pennsylvania Police Chief Killed and Officer Injured in Shooting
results.abstract: A man who was accused of shooting the officers later stole a vehicle, and he was fatally shot after an exchange of gunfire with the police.

media.caption: A shooting in Brackenridge, Pa., on Monday left a police chief dead.

results.adx_keywords: Snow and Snowstorms;Traffic Accidents and Safety;Automobiles;Actors and Actresses;Renner, Jeremy;Marvel Entertainment;Paramount Pictures;Reno (Nev);Washoe County (Nev)
results.title: Jeremy Renner Was Run Over by 7-Ton Snow Plow, Authorities Say
results.abstract: The 51-year-old Marvel actor, who remained in a critical but stable condition on Tuesday, said in an Instagram post that he was “too messed up now to type,” but sent his love.

media.caption: Jeremy Renner at the premiere of the Marvel mini-series “Hawkeye” in Los Angeles in 2021.

results.adx_keywords: Traffic Accidents and Safety;Deaths (Fatalities);Automobiles
results.byline: By Jenny Gross and McKenna Oxenden
results.title: Father Deliberately Drove Car Off Cliff, Authorities Say After Dramatic Rescue
results.abstract: Dharmesh A. Patel was arrested on suspicion of attempted murder and child abuse after his Tesla careened off a treacherous cliff in Northern California with him, his wife and two children inside, the authorities said.

media.caption: At the scene of the crash, off Highway 1 in Northern California on Monday.

results.adx_keywords: Labor and Jobs;Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures;Rural Areas;Population;Shutdowns (Institutional);Agriculture and Farming;Economic Conditions and Trends;Dairy Products;Age, Chronological;Retirement;Japan;Hokkaido (Japan)
results.byline: By Ben Dooley and Hisako Ueno
results.title: Japan’s Business Owners Can’t Find Successors. This Man Is Giving His Away.
results.abstract: An owner’s struggle in Japan’s northern dairy region illuminates one of the potentially devastating economic impacts of an aging society.

media.caption: Hidekazu Yokoyama decided to give away a successful business because his children and employees weren’t interested in running it.
media.copyright: Noriko Hayashi for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Firearms;Power Failures and Blackouts;Pierce County (Wash);Washington (State)
results.title: 2 Charged in Attacks on Substations in Washington State
results.abstract: One man told law enforcement officials that he and another person had planned to disrupt power in the area to commit a burglary, according to court documents. The attacks left thousands without power.

media.caption: Crews at an electrical substation in Graham, Wash., that was damaged early on Christmas morning.

results.adx_keywords: Illegal Immigration;Immigration Detention;National Parks, Monuments and Seashores;Homeland Security Department;United States Coast Guard;Cuba;Florida;Florida Keys;Key West (Fla);Dry Tortugas National Park (Fla)
results.title: Remote Florida Archipelago Closes After Hundreds of Migrants Arrive
results.abstract: Dry Tortugas National Park will close for “several days” so that authorities and medical workers can evaluate, care for and transport some 300 migrants, park officials said.

media.caption: Dry Tortugas National Park closed on Monday after 300 migrants arrived over the past couple of days.
media.copyright: Rolando Diaz for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Midterm Elections (2022);Santos, George (1988- );Trump, Donald J;House of Representatives;Long Island (NY)
results.title: A Con Man Is Succeeding Me in Congress Today
results.abstract: Now we know that no one voted for the real George Santos.

results.adx_keywords: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Colleges and Universities;Extradition;Graduate Schools and Students;University of Idaho;Washington State University;Idaho;Moscow (Idaho);Pennsylvania
results.byline: By David DeKok and Nicholas Bogel-Burroughs
results.title: Suspect in Killing of 4 Idaho Undergrads Agrees to Be Extradited
results.abstract: The 28-year-old Ph.D. student accused in the killings will be taken to Idaho to face four counts of murder after making a brief appearance in a Pennsylvania courtroom.

results.adx_keywords: United States Politics and Government;Appointments and Executive Changes;Jeffries, Hakeem;Democratic Party;House of Representatives
results.title: Hakeem Jeffries Takes Over as Leader of House Democrats
results.abstract: A lawyer and disciplined tactician, Mr. Jeffries is the first Black politician to lead either party in Congress.

media.caption: Representative Hakeem Jeffries, 52, represents a generational change for House Democrats after two decades under Nancy Pelosi.
media.copyright: Shuran Huang for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Heart;Football;Sports Injuries;Hamlin, Damar (1998- );Buffalo Bills;National Football League
results.title: Damar Hamlin’s Cardiac Arrest: What We Know and Don’t Know
results.abstract: Cardiac doctors say that blows to the chest causing an erratic heart rhythm are highly unusual, but not unheard-of in sports.

media.caption: Players reacted while Damar Hamlin of the Buffalo Bills was tended to by medical personnel on Monday night.

results.adx_keywords: Television;Movies;Content Type: Personal Profile;Bentley, Wes
results.title: Wes Bentley Was at Rock Bottom. Now He Is on ‘Yellowstone.’
results.abstract: Years of addiction and struggle followed his breakout role in “American Beauty.” He lived to tell the tale, and get a major role on TV’s biggest show.

media.caption: “I’ve prided myself for most of my career on leaving it at the door,” Wes Bentley said of his challenging role as Jamie Dutton on “Yellowstone.” “But Jamie’s sadness permeates my life.”
media.copyright: Peter Fisher for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Snow and Snowstorms;Actors and Actresses;Accidents and Safety;Renner, Jeremy;Lake Tahoe (Nev)
results.title: Jeremy Renner Is in Critical Condition After Snow Plowing Accident
results.abstract: The actor, known for his role as Hawkeye in Marvel’s Avengers movies, had surgery, his representative said.

media.caption: Jeremy Renner plays the superhero Hawkeye in Marvel movies and a television series.

results.adx_keywords: Russian Invasion of Ukraine (2022);Missiles and Missile Defense Systems;Defense and Military Forces;Deaths (Fatalities);Makiivka (Ukraine);Russia;Ukraine
results.byline: By Matthew Mpoke Bigg, Anatoly Kurmanaev and Richard Pérez-Peña
results.title: Deadly Strike on Russians in Ukraine Exposes Moscow’s Military Failings
results.abstract: A Ukrainian attack with U.S.-made rockets may have left hundreds of casualties, and pro-war Russians accused their military commanders of repeating fatal errors.

results.adx_keywords: Sports Injuries;Football;Concussions;Vincent, Troy;Hamlin, Damar (1998- );Buffalo Bills;Cincinnati Bengals;National Football League
results.title: N.F.L. Says Suspended Game Won’t Resume This Week as Hamlin Stays in Hospital
results.abstract: An uncle of Damar Hamlin, a Bills safety who went into cardiac arrest during Monday’s game, said Tuesday night that doctors were working to get his nephew breathing on his own without a ventilator.

media.caption: Buffalo Bills players stayed on the field as an ambulance carried away safety Damar Hamlin. Hamlin was in critical condition on Tuesday morning.
media.copyright: Joseph Maiorana/USA Today Sports, via Reuters

results.adx_keywords: Cats;Pets;Animal Behavior;Animal Cognition;Research;your-feed-science;Animal Cognition (Journal)
results.title: Your Cat Might Not Be Ignoring You When You Speak
results.abstract: Cats have a reputation for being aloof, but a new study has found that their relationships with their owners may be stronger than we thought.

media.caption: Cats are often seen as aloof. But in a new study, they were not ignoring their owners, but instead “their reactions were very subtle,” the lead author of the study said.

results.adx_keywords: Rain;Snow and Snowstorms;Tornadoes;Winter (Season);Weather;Midwestern States (US);Southern States (US);Texas;Minnesota
results.title: Heavy Snowfall and Tornadoes Wreak Havoc on Midwest and South
results.abstract: A “multi-hazard” storm that had already flooded the West Coast turned into a large winter storm system as it moved across the country.

media.caption: Vehicles traveled along a snow-lined U.S. Route 50 on Sunday, the morning after a winter storm had pelted Northern California.
media.copyright: Stephen Lam/San Francisco Chronicle, via Associated Press

results.adx_keywords: Stunts and Stuntmen;Automobiles;Deaths (Obituaries);Block, Ken (1967-2023)
results.title: Ken Block, Rally Driver and YouTube Stuntman, Dies at 55
results.abstract: The acclaimed driver, best known for his “Gymkhana” videos, was killed in a snowmobile accident.

media.caption: Ken Block at a rally car event in Portugal in 2017. He was killed in a snowmobile accident on Monday.

results.adx_keywords: United States Politics and Government;Midterm Elections (2022);Santos, George (1988- );House of Representatives;Long Island (NY)
results.byline: By Annie Karni and Michael Gold
results.title: George Santos Came to Washington. It Was Awkward.
results.abstract: On the first day of the 118th Congress, the representative-elect, a Republican who has made false claims about his background, education and finances, brought his saga to Capitol Hill.

media.caption: George Santos is under the shadow of active investigations by federal and local prosecutors into potential criminal activity during his two congressional campaigns.

results.adx_keywords: Frauds and Swindling;United States Politics and Government;Content Type: Personal Profile;Santos, George (1988- );House of Representatives;Brazil
results.byline: By Grace Ashford and André Spigariol
results.title: Brazilian Authorities Will Revive Fraud Case Against George Santos
results.abstract: A 2008 court case had been suspended because Brazilian law enforcement officials could not find Mr. Santos.

media.caption: Although George Santos had once admitted to using a stolen checkbook in Brazil, he now asserts that he is not a criminal “here or in Brazil.”
